Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, in front of the Dentra Archery Range.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the Advanced Archer's Archery Range is located on the south side of the road. This range is used by only the finest archers in the land. To prevent some embarassment, young archers are urged to get permission before entering this area of the Dentra Archery Range. Competition can be fierce, but always a lot of fun.
